title: Get up to 31% OFF with the Boya Mini Wireless Microphone!
description: It's one of the smallest—and most affordable—lav mics available. The post Get up to 31% OFF with the Boya Mini Wireless Microphone! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It's one of the smallest—and most affordable—lav mics available.
text: BOYA’s wide selection of wireless audio solutions are some of the more budget-friendly options available on the market, and folks looking for a portable addition to their content creation setup might want to check out the BOYA mini. It’s currently on sale right now, going for just forty bucks over on Amazon. Weighing in at just 5 grams, the BOYA mini’s design allows it to be easily clipped onto your clothing for hands-free operation, and is no larger than most thumbs. It comes with audio features such as 48kHz/16-bit sampling rate and 80dB SNR, AI-based noise cancellation, voice modulation effects, and up to 30 hours of battery life using the charging case. As for hardware compatibility, the BOYA mini works with smartphones, tablets, and even cameras.
